EmailTemplate.name: Jun25Webinar-Compliance.Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Attending - Resources from our Compliance Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
Thank you for attending MBO's webinar titled "Compliance Officer Training: The Refresher Course on IC Qualification" held on Tuesday, June 25. Jay Lash, VP of Market Strategies at MBO Partners - Enterprise Solutions, hosted a conversation between legal expert Lonnie Goldman and Dave Cassar, MBO Partners VP of Operations, about helping Compliance Officers better understand the growing complexities and misconceptions surrounding of independent contractor classification. Below you will find links related to the presentation: Webinar Recording <http://video.mbopartners.com/players/v4uFa2n9-mMm4x1IW.html> Webinar Slide Deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/2013-06-compliance-officer-training-webinar.ppsx> <http://sig.org/webinars.php> Connect with Jay <http://www.linkedin.com/in/jaylash> Post-Webinar Survey <http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/WJFYMPY>
